articles.content:
Here is your Liverpool morning digest for Saturday, June 11. 
Aymeric Laporte struggles to stay silent as Mohamed Salah wins silverware

articles.author: Caleb Sage
articles.title: Tottenham 'were in' for 'sensational' £85.5m star at Hotspur Way - GIVEMESPORT
articles.description: Tottenham could be in the race to sign one of the most in-demand players in football right now, but he could cost them £85.5m.
articles.content:
Tottenham could have been in the race to sign Benfica striker Darwin Nunez as well, believes journalist Jacque Talbot.
The 22-year-old has been heavily linked to both Liverpool and Manchester United… [+2565 chars]
